Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory870.jpg'}
{3: 'With a stroke of luck coming out of nowhere, you manage to get the generator to work by tinkering and pulling the lever, bringing power back to the amusement park.'}
{2: 'Diesel generators never go wrong.', 3: '10'}
{3: "As you're about to leave, you notice something inside a bag nearby."}
{3: "You can't believe they still have one of these around..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory291.png'}
{3: "When you're back to where Luna is, you notice that only certain areas of the amusement park have power restored—and unfortunately, the Ferris wheel isn't one of them."}
{3: "Looks like it's one of those days."}
{2: 'So diesel generators can and DO go wrong...', 3: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "Don't blame the generator. It could be the circuitry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Besides, a Ferris wheel that's gone this much out of shape is a structural hazard itself.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna remains unfazed—she never got her hopes up to begin with.'}
{2: 'How about we try this out?', 3: '23'}
{3: 'You pull out a Polaroid from behind your back—the one you found in the bag earlier.'}
{3: 'The leather bag must have been well-sealed—the Polaroid looks like it might still work.'}
{2: 'There are some films and batteries. Want to take some pictures?', 3: '26'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'A Polaroid?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'My dad gave me one when I was a kid.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I'd always run out of the films I got from Dad taking pictures everywhere.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I've never taken any pictures ever since...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's probably not going to work now, though, since it's been sitting around unused for so long.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's try it anyway.", 3: '34'}
{3: "You insert the batteries into the Polaroid—and, with a stroke of luck, the Polaroid works, although there's only one bar of power left."}
{3: 'You load the film pack, and the protective sheet ejects automatically. Raising the Polaroid, you gesture toward Luna.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Give me a moment... Turn around.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Turn around)', 3: '43'}
{3: 'A strange sound comes from behind, lasting only about a minute before stopping.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'There you go.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'When you turn back around, Luna has changed into a pure white dress.'}
{3: 'Dressed in white like she used to wear, she smiles at you—but this time, her eyes are no longer golden.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'How do I look?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You look beautiful.', 3: '52'}
{3: "Luna's face brightens as she points to the carousel."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I want to take pictures with the carousel!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Catching herself being unusually excited, Luna quickly composes herself.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I mean, that place looks like a good spot for a good picture.', 4: '1'}
{3: "It seems that even Luna has a girly side—or perhaps Luna, on a certain level, is every bit a girl as any other girl you've seen."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory921.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryQujingkuang.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Luna leans against one of the horses on the carousel, waiting for the shutter to click.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryQujingkuang.prefab'}
{3: 'Click.'}
{3: 'The flash goes off, and the photo slowly emerges from the camera.'}
{3: 'Luna quickly moves closer, her eyes fixed intently on the photo in hand.'}
{3: '...Only to see nothing materialize in the picture.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...Guess this film is dead.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With it, Luna raises her hand ready to throw the photo away.'}
{3: "There's a faint trace of color on the photo paper that, to you, appears to be a human figure."}
{2: "It's not dead. You just gotta give it a few minutes to develop.", 3: '80'}
{2: "It's your turn to take a picture of me now.", 3: '81'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Same spot, similar pose, and once again the flash goes off.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "Say... why don't we take a picture together?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryQujingkuang.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'As you raise the Polaroid and move closer to Luna ready to press the shutter, you hear her talking to you.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'A little closer.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Glancing at Luna, you see her gaze fixed on the lens, her expression composed—yet her cheeks are tinged with a slight blush.'}
{3: 'You press the shutter, except there is no flash this time. Turning the camera around, you see that the Polaroid has run out of battery.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryQujingkuang.prefab'}
{3: 'She pauses for a moment, then lets out a soft sigh before walking over to sit on the steps.'}
{2: 'Want to take a few more pictures?', 3: '108', 4: 'There might be more batteries around here somewhere.', 5: '108'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "No, that's fine. I'm happy now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna shakes her head and gazes into the distance. You sit down beside her.'}
{3: 'You feel a gentle weight on your shoulder as she rests her head against you.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Don't move or say anything."}
{3: 'And so the two of you sit in silence, gazing into the distant darkness.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If you were the only one left in this world... what would you do?'}
{3: "You can't see Luna's face, nor guess at how she feels from her tone."}
{3: "The weird noises you heard while you were out cold, the abnormal weather patterns, Luna's subtle changes—all these clues point to an answer too clear to be ignored."}
{3: "It's just... a little too cruel."}
{2: "I'd do everything in my power to survive.", 3: '123', 4: 'I might not make it. Death would probably come quickly.', 5: '126'}
{2: 'Someone has to keep moving forward.', 3: '124'}
{2: 'There might not be a happy ending...', 3: '125'}
{2: "But giving it everything you've got—that alone is something remarkable in and of itself.", 3: '129'}
{2: 'A single person can never hope to amount to much.', 3: '127'}
{2: "There is no way I'd have gotten this far without everyone's help.", 3: '128'}
{2: "I don't think I'd make it if I were all alone by myself.", 3: '129'}
{3: "The world sinks into silence, filled only by the howling wind and the sound of your breathing and Luna's."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory166.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory166.png'}
{3: "It's only when a golden ray shines upon the two of you that you realize the sun has risen."}
{3: 'She hands over two photographs.'}
{3: "You can now clearly see what's in the picture."}
{2: 'The colors seem a bit off, though...', 3: '141'}
{2: "But it's still beautiful.", 3: '142'}
{3: 'Having expired for God only knows how long, the film developer is slowly doing wonders.'}
{3: 'The photos are covered in fine grain, with an overall bluish tint—like the overzealous first attempt of an amateur color grader.'}
{3: "The contrast isn't high, but the details in the shadows are preserved precisely because of it."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "For something this old, it's held up rather well.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gazes at the two photos before her with contentment in her eyes.'}
{3: 'Then it hits you—that these photos might be the first ones Luna has taken of herself since her transformation.'}
{2: 'We can find a better camera next time.', 3: '150'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I remember you saying you didn't think I was lying.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Actually, I did tell a lie.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't tell me you're going to apologize to me?", 3: '157'}
{3: 'The same lightheadedness hits you again before Luna even finishes what she has to say—this time with an even more intense wave of pain.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'With it, your body gives out and collapses helplessly.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '【kuroname】!'}
{2: "You've got to be kidding..."}
